name: Moving (Mikkorama)
description:
This is a short story about what it was like to move to a new home. It takes a few minutes to complete. Thank you for playing!

Press right arrow to drive the car

Press up when in front of buildings with a stop sign to view a special scene, and press right to go back to driving
